name: PRESANS
tag_list: innovation, intermediary, market-place, research, university, industry
overview:
Social network for researchers, connecting industry needs to expertise

PRESANS is an open innovation intermediary spinning off of the Ecole Polytechnique in France. In the open innovation context, industrials have to constantly find new partners to outsource a fraction of their R&D activity. We help the R&D department of our customers to connect to the right Experts and to solve some of their more complex problems.
